prompt_output: An overhead satellite view displays a vast agricultural landscape composed of numerous rectangular dark green fields, likely cultivated with crops. Several small clusters of buildings and structures are scattered throughout the scene, primarily located at the junctions or edges of the roads. Notable structures include a cluster with a dark roof and a red-colored element near the central north-south road, and another area in the top right corner featuring a bright blue tarp or cover. A similar blue tarp is visible in the bottom right corner. Some fields exhibit visible rows, while others appear as solid expanses of green. The overall impression is one of organized rural farming land.

The dark green rectangular areas are identified as fields, intersected by light-colored roads. Specific details like blue tarps and red structures are mentioned to provide a comprehensive description of the visible elements.
